Rat Pack

UI Engineer & Programmer

Febuary - March 2024

Rat Pack is a two-player fighting game starring two of the founding members of Rat Economy, my 19 person game studio. It was created in a month as a birthday present for the two of them, and to practice our team workflow before Iron Testament development kicked off.

As a UI Engineer I was responsible for:

  • All menus including character & map selection, versus screen, and credits.
  • All in-game UI including health bars, countdown clock, and character portraits.

As a Programmer I was responsible for:

  • Setting up a round according to player selections (characters and maps).
  • Implementing all music, voicelines, and sound effects.
  • Implementing character art and configuring animations.
